template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a high-stakes professional task in {regulated_domain} that requires structured analysis, identifying risks or compliance issues, proposing revisions, and delivering both technical and executive summaries; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a high-stakes professional task in financial audits that requires structured analysis, identifying risks or compliance issues, proposing revisions, and delivering both technical and executive summaries; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Analyze this financial audit to detect risks and compliance gaps, recommend edits, and prepare both detailed and executive summaries.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, user wants a concise single-sentence prompt under 45 words for a high-stakes financial audit task. Let me break down the requirements: needs structured analysis, risk/compliance identification, revisions, and dual summaries. 

Okay, professional tone is key given the finance context. Can combine all elements into one fluid instruction. 

"Analyze" covers structured approach, "detect risks/compliance gaps" hits the identification part, "recommend edits" addresses revisions, "prepare detailed and executive summaries" fulfills the dual reporting need. 

Counting the words... 23. Under limit. Sentence flows naturally while being directive. This should work.
